name: Nature Park
description:
Adventure escape games.

You start from the top of the mountain. Your goal is to escape from the forest.

To get out of the forest, you need to look around for weapons.

If you don't have weapons, you won't be able to cross the monster swarm.

When you escape from the forest, don't worry, there won't be any monsters chasing you. You can enjoy the beautiful scenery.

Features of the game:

Real first person shooting experience

Fast paced positional warfare

Choose a bunker, shoot the enemy, and look forward to your escape!
